title: Riot i have perma ban pls unban my account
body: Riot pls unban my account my brother was playing and he was flaming ,this will not repeat anymore pls riot unban my account Love you{{item:3751}}

replies.body:
1. How are you going to prove it was your brother?

2. Why was your brother on your account?

3. Who was responsible for the 14 day ban that the account has had?

4. How many licks does it take to get to the tootsie rolls center of a tootsie pop?

> [{quoted}](name=Imperial Pandaa,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K3A6yXOL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-16T17:23:04.222+0000)
>
> 1. How are you going to prove it was your brother?
> 
> 2. Why was your brother on your account?
> 
> 3. Who was responsible for the 14 day ban that the account has had?
> 
> 4. How many licks does it take to get to the tootsie rolls center of a tootsie pop?

account sharing is against ToS anyway so the ban will stay even if he prove it was his brother :^)

> 4.How many licks does it take to get to the tootsie rolls center of a tootsie pop?


Challenge accepted.
I will come back in about 3 hours.

it tooks exactly 123 licks.

it was 

fun.

Account sharing btw

So nope, not gonna happen
Why was he using your computer?

> [{quoted}](name=DeracadaVenom,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K3A6yXOL,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-12-16T17:28:42.116+0000)
>
> Why was he using your computer?

Not everyone has their own computer, and has to share.

> [{quoted}](name=Modi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K3A6yXOL,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-12-16T18:20:05.177+0000)
>
> Not everyone has their own computer, and has to share.

Let's put it in another way, why was his brother on his account?

Riot doesn't unban permabanned accounts unless it's a 100% false positive. Since you admitted there was flaming on your account that isn't the case.

Also you account shared, which is also against the ToS, another reason to not unban you.
